General.Name: NamR SA
General.Description: namR Société anonyme develops SaaS based software solutions. The company provides asknamR platform, a software to find and target real estate assets for businesses and local governments; and solaR solution to find out the solar potential of various buildings and create the right conditions for citizens. It also offers SmartHome Pricing solutions for insurers to simplify underwriting process and speed up claims processing. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

5.Name: Ms. Anne  Seringe
5.Title: Head of Marketing / Com & Sales KYB
